New Records: Anthony Edwards became the second player after Stephen Curry to make 50 threes in the first nine games of the season
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards made 37 points, including 9 threes, in the 127-102 win over the Portland Trail Blazers
Pre-Game Insights: Defenders going under screens on Anthony Edwards is a strategy that he is not used to, and he expressed genuine shock over it
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards stated that he will continue to shoot the ball if the opposing team is trying to prevent a downhill drive to the basket
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards' confidence is admirable, and he has been incredibly effective in his three-point shooting despite the league not working on breaking his streak
Others: Anthony Edwards has made 190 threes in 79 games last season, and he is on a dream run to capitalize on the trend of three-point shooting in the league
